thread.title: Dayle

author: Dayle
title: Dayle
text: I've done 5 awesome group trips with Intrepid the Bali one with Nova being the absolute standout because of the people on the trip. However, I did a small solo 3 day Varanasi trip in India in 2016 which was not acceptable! I actually moved hotels and paid extra for the nights I was there. When I complained about the hotel AND the rude, sexist, guide, they made me feel as if it was my fault, they took no responsibility and I considered going with their opposition on my next trip. I haven't made up my mind on that yet.
